turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to order a cinnamon short bread latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. unfortunately, that is a seasonal drink and is not currently available. do you want another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want a flat white.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti. Whole milk is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and which starbucks should i make this order at.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the order is for 1 venti iced flat white with whole milk from Starbucks in Austin, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 25 mins.
